resources.string:
This app is designed with a single activity architecture, utilizing multiple fragments to efficiently manage the user interface and core functionalities. This approach ensures smooth navigation and a well-structured design.

Room Database: The app employs a Room Database to store and organize gym exercises locally. The exercises include detailed instructions and accompanying GIFs to demonstrate proper form and technique.

Comprehensive Exercise Library: Explore a wide variety of exercises targeting different muscle groups. All exercises are dynamically retrieved from the local database to ensure a seamless browsing experience.

Navigation Drawer: The intuitive navigation drawer allows users to easily switch between sections such as HOME, FAVORITE EXERCISES, ABOUT US, and HELP.

Search and Filter: A powerful search feature helps users quickly find exercises based on specific body parts, equipment, or other criteria, making it easy to tailor workouts to individual preferences.

Offline Access: Save exercises for offline use and access them anytime in the Saved Exercises section, ensuring your workouts are always within reach.

Discover a comprehensive collection of gym exercises and workout routines, all in one convenient app.

Step-by-Step Guidance: Each exercise includes detailed instructions and animated GIFs to help you perform them with proper form.

Personalized Workouts: Save your favorite exercises and create a tailored fitness experience that suits your goals.

Fast and Intuitive: Enjoy a seamless, user-friendly interface designed for fitness enthusiasts of all levels.

Your Fitness Companion: From beginner to advanced exercises, our app provides everything you need to stay motivated and achieve your fitness goals.
